<rule id="springboot-metrics-to-quarkus-0100" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <dependency artifactId="micrometer-core" groupId="io.micrometer"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="5" title="Replace the Micrometer dependency with Quarkus Microprofile 'metrics' extension">
                    <message>
                        Replace the Micrometer dependency with Quarkus Microprofile 'metrics' extension.  
                        Usually this is a transitive dependency brought by `org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-actuator` and has to be replaced by `io.quarkus:quarkus-smallrye-metrics` artifact
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/microprofile-metrics" title="Quarkus metrics"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
